column4: i'm getting a "PCI: Failed to allocate mem" error that is b0rking my network card... anyone know any solutions to these problems?
i get it before anything has booted up, it's on my bootup list
then it is a driver issue indeed.  the lack of a driver, might be more percise.    if you can get it working then build a new initramfs.img/initrd.img   it might work.......   i said might.
